segments.text: I can't believe how the woman is just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edge, making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, trying to sneak cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching up to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry seeing how careless they are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery with all that water; someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children before they get into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry thinking about the potential mess and accidents that could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so serene compared to the busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
